extensionDescription.message: Export your Amazon order history as JSON or CSV files

popupTitle.description: Title shown in the popup header

notAmazonWarning.message: Please navigate to your Amazon Order History page to use this extension.
notAmazonWarning.description: Warning shown when not on Amazon order history page

goToOrderHistory.description: Link text to navigate to Amazon order history

exportRange.description: Section title for export range options

exportAllOrders.description: Radio option to export all orders

selectDateRange.description: Radio option to select a date range

exportFormat.description: Section title for export format options

errorSelectDates.message: Please select both start and end dates.
errorSelectDates.description: Error when dates are not selected

errorDateOrder.message: Start date must be before end date.
errorDateOrder.description: Error when start date is after end date

exportStartedMessage.message: Starting export... The page will navigate through your order history.

exportStartedStatus.message: Export started! Keep this popup open or check the browser tab. The page will navigate through years automatically.

errorGetTab.description: Error when tab cannot be accessed

exportInitiatedStatus.message: Export initiated! Watch the browser tab - it will navigate through your orders. File will download when complete.
exportInitiatedStatus.description: Status message when export is initiated

exportFailedRefresh.message: Failed to start export. Make sure you are on the Amazon order history page and refresh the page.
exportFailedRefresh.description: Error message when export fails to start

noYearsFound.message: No years found to export. Please make sure you are on the Amazon order history page.
noYearsFound.description: Alert when no years are found

processingYear.description: Progress message while processing a year

fetchingPricesProgress.description: Progress message for individual order price fetch

extensionInstalled.message: Order History Exporter for Amazon installed

extensionUpdated.message: Order History Exporter for Amazon updated to version
